attributes.action: Allow wedding to still go ahead with 15 being allowed to attend
attributes.additional_details: Just feel like we are being punished and its unfair the can be guidelines put in place for weddings like there is funerals
attributes.background: Allow couples to still get married with 15 to attend like funerals

rejection.details:
From 2 December, wedding ceremonies will be permitted in all tiers 1-3 in England, with up to 15 attendees. In tiers 1 and 2, up to 15 people will also be able to attend wedding receptions. See:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know
